QuestData.Title: Among the Kyrian
QuestData.Description:
You will be well at home among the kyrian, $Gbrother:sister;. We welcome your aid.
The Archon was so confident in this outcome that she has arranged a grand reception for you in honor of your efforts against the Maldraxxus incursion into our realm.
For now, all you must do is journey to the Seat of Eternal Hymns. I shall meet you there.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Polemarch Adrestes at the Seat of Eternal Hymns in Bastion.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Polemarch Adrestes at the Seat of Eternal Hymns in Bastion.

Objectives.Objective: Fly to Hero's Rest in Bastion (Optional)
